perturbation.original_text: 1.1 ADVERTISING shall mean any paid advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site, but excluding Advertising that is not paid for or which is part of an overall partnering or revenue sharing arrangement and any Product Listings.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.1 ADVERTISING shall mean any advertisements, links, pointers, sponsorships, buttons, banners, navigation, or any other placements or promotions or similar services or rights on a Site, including Advertising that is not paid for or which is part of an overall partnering or revenue sharing arrangement and any Product Listings.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'Advertising' has been altered to include advertisements that are not paid for and those which are part of revenue-sharing arrangements. This contradicts the original definition which specifically excludes these types of advertisements, thus creating ambiguity in what constitutes 'Advertising' under the contract.

perturbation.original_text: 1.22 NEOFORMA CONTENT shall mean the Neoforma Career Content and the Neoforma T&E Content.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.22 NEOFORMA CONTENT shall mean the Neoforma Career Content, the Neoforma T&E Content and VerticalNet Content.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'NEOFORMA CONTENT' has been broadened to include 'VerticalNet Content,' which is separately defined and governed in the agreement. This conflation introduces potential disputes over ownership, usage rights, and liabilities associated with content from different sources.

perturbation.original_text: 1.46 TRANSACTION FEE shall mean any payments, including, without limitation, fees and commissions, but collected by a Party from a third party in consideration for goods or services, excluding any Advertising for the benefit of a third party, provided or promoted at one or more Sites operated or controlled by such Party.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.46 TRANSACTION FEE shall mean any payments, including, without limitation, fees and commissions, and collected by a Party from a third party in consideration for goods or services, including any Advertising for the benefit of a third party, provided or promoted at one or more Sites operated or controlled by such Party.
perturbation.explanation: The definition of 'TRANSACTION FEE' is altered to include revenue from 'Advertising,' which was explicitly excluded in the original definition. This creates a conflict because revenue from advertising is treated separately elsewhere in the contract and this inclusion blurs revenue-sharing agreements.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law - Revenue recognition, breach of contract
